snippet: Some hotel chains have started selling branded products in an effort to lure customers back for another visit.
abstract: Some hotel chains have started selling branded products in an effort to lure customers back for another visit; Westin Hotels has been particularly successful with its line of Heavenly branded products, including robes, bedding, lotions and shampoos.
lead_paragraph: Some hotel chains have started selling branded products in an effort to lure customers back for another visit.

headline.seo: Hotel Product Offerings Beyond the Bathrobe
